c74object.name: ears.model.sps.synthesis~
c74object.description: Applies the Essentia sinusoidal-plus-stochastic synthesis model

inlet.digest: Frequencies @description List of frequencies (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)
inlet.description: List of frequencies (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)

inlet.digest: Magnitudes @description List of magnitudes (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)
inlet.description: List of magnitudes (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)

inlet.digest: Phases @description List of phases (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)
inlet.description: List of phases (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)

inlet.digest: Stochastic envelopes @description Stochastic envelopes (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)
inlet.description: Stochastic envelopes (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)

method.name: list/llll
method.description: A list or llll with buffer names will trigger the buffer processing and output the processed buffer names (depending on the naming attribute).

attribute.name: sr
attribute.description: Sets the output sample rate; leave 0 to pick the current one from Max.

attribute.name: stocf
attribute.description: Sets the decimation factor of the stochastic approximation.

entry.name: Inlet 1 (llll)
entry.description: Frequencies @description List of frequencies (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame). List of frequencies (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)

entry.name: Inlet 2 (llll)
entry.description: Magnitudes @description List of magnitudes (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame). List of magnitudes (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)

entry.name: Inlet 3 (llll)
entry.description: Phases @description List of phases (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame). List of phases (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)

entry.name: Inlet 4 (llll)
entry.description: Stochastic envelopes @description Stochastic envelopes (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame). Stochastic envelopes (one level for each channel, then one level for each frame)
